item.title: linux Server Tools
item.description: Tools yang biasa digunakan pada server linux: Firewall iptables ipset shorewall csf Anti Malware maldet (malware detection for web directory) IDS tripwire Identity Server FreeIPA (IPA = Identity, Policy, Authentication) Video Conference jitsi More and more Customer support live chat rocket.chat tawk.to simple chat
